page.title: 06THE CORNER SHOP
page.content: Mr Sandford was made redundant and decided to buy a corner shop and work for himself.Shop keeping wasn't in the family but his Aunty and Uncle owned a small shop.Mr Sandford has to get up at 5.30 a.m to prepare the shop for a day's work.It takes about 1 hour to clean up the shop but on Saturdays it takes 2 hours.He re-stocks mainly on Wednesdays.Cigarettes are sold most since he started. He dislikes computers and will not sell expensive goods.Mrs Sandford gets mad when the floor gets dirty every night.Children come in the shop mainly but most old people think it is more convenient than a big super market.Mrs Sandford likes fancy goods and makes a lot of money out of them.Unknown items will never sell.The shop is roughly 11ft by 18ft.Mr Sandford said shop keeping had improved over the years for him.
